title: Fantastic opportunity to live in the luxuriously renovated  Apt.
description:
Fantastic opportunity to live in the luxuriously renovated Cigar Factory in Northern Liberties. Minutes from Liberties Walk, Fishtown, restaurants, bars, shops, public transportation (Market-Frankford line) and easy access to I-95. This 1,500 square foot, 2 bedroom ( 1 small), 2 full bathroom condo has 14 foot ceilings, 8 foot tall windows , concrete floors and original 1890 exposed brick throughout. Kitchen has top of the line appliances, granite countertops and tons of cabinet space. The master bedroom is fully surrounded by exposed brick. The master bathroom has his and her sinks, a jacuzzi tub and walk-in shower. In addition to the master bedroom, there is an additional space noted as a bedroom, that is currently being used as a huge walk in closet that can also be used as an in home office, work out space, or even a wine closet. Off of the open concept living area, there is an additional walk in closet. Unit also includes central air/heating, coat closet, washer/dryer included (in second bathroom), single dedicated parking space in bottom floor garage, additional storage area at rear of parking space,elevator access to all floors, call box entry. The indoor parking space can fit an over-sized vehicle and is a very rare amenity that you don't usually find in Northern Liberties. It is even heated for those cold winter mornings. Never worry about parking again! No smoking. Pets are allowed. First and last months, as well as one month's security deposit required for move in.

title: a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties!
description:
Welcome HOME to 117 Fairmount Ave -- a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties! Enter through the vestibule into a sunny and spacious living area equipped with oversized windows and a working fireplace, followed by the large dining area, a convenient half bath, and the kitchen - featuring stainless steel appliances, striking backsplash, eat-in peninsula, and plenty of cabinet and counter space. Just off the kitchen is the secluded back patio - perfect for gardening, grilling, entertaining, or kicking back to relax. The second floor is home to the primary bedroom, a large bathroom with claw foot tub and separate stall shower, and the second bedroom which boasts a built-in wet vanity and plenty of closet space. The third floor consists of the third bedroom which gets plenty of natural light, and a half flight of stairs takes you to the lofted fourth bedroom with vaulted ceilings and large windows allowing for fabulous views of the waterfront and Ben Franklin Bridge. Throughout the home, you'll enjoy ample storage space, original decorative arched windows, high ceilings, original hard wood flooring, clean basement with laundry, and loads of historic charm. Last but certainly not least, THE LOCATION is amazing -- a stone's throw from all that NoLibs has to offer; situated within close walking distance to local favorites and shopping/dining/nightlife on 2nd Street; easy commute to Old City, Fishtown, Center City, and beyond; close to grocery stores, convenience stores, highways, hospitals, parks, playgrounds, public transportation, and much much more! BONUS PERKS: Landlords arrange for a monthly house cleaning service at no cost to the tenant!! The block has restricted parking, so if you get a PPA permit you can park in front of the house at almost any time!! Schedule your today -- you need to see this one in person!

title: Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment Home, Lounge, Gym, Sauna, Near Shopping
description:
The home at 2315 is a 575 square foot one bedroom one bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. The bathroom is also renovated. This home features neutral carpet to go with any decor well. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Most of the large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One of the windows in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a view of the park. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table from Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
*  24/7 top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 On-site Maintenance
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Large closets
* Large windows
* Carpet
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Call Jocelyn  show contact info
x122 or Michelle at  show contact info
x129 to schedule an appointment to tour. Please note that an appointment is required to tour at this time. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com for the most up-to-date availability!
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
1-22 month lease terms available!

Welcome home!

title: Brand New Townhouse for rent in Downingtown
description:
Be the first one to live in this brand new resort style townhouse in the newly developed East Village community in Downingtown. Conveniently located near the intersection of Route 30 and Woodbine Rd, East Village is right behind Downingtown Country Club and the Point at Downingtown. Shopping and restaurants are all within walking distance.  House is in a tranquil community of 225 single, twin and townhouses. Side walks and walking trails will connect the Community with a state-of-the art clubhouse, pool and fitness center.
The townhouse for rent is the largest model (28 feet wide) with 2377 sq. feet's living space on the first and second floor plus a full 9 feet basement for storage. This is NOT a tuck under style townhouse. Its two car garage is on the same level as the kitchen and family/living room so you can save tons of energy transporting grocery and small kids in and out of the house without going up and down the stairs.
First floor comes with a wide foyer, powder room, closet, kitchen, dining room, family/living room and pantry. Pantry entrance is right beside garage door. Second floor feature a spacious (16'4 x 22'10) master bedroom with upgraded tray ceiling and recess lights; a master bath with double sinks; two more spacious bedrooms and a hallway bath. Laundry room are conveniently located on the second floor. Brand new stainless steel appliances, granite counter top, white kitchen cabinets. Tons of recess lights throughout the house. Hardwood floor and stairs.
Owner pays HOA and property taxes. Renters responsible for utilities and other occupant related expenses such as water, sewer, trash, gas, electricity.

Walk to Whole Foods, convenience stores, the pharmacy, or one of the many bars and restaurants that Fairmount Ave has to offer.  Stroll on down to Kelly Drive for a run around the loop.  Watch the rowers go up and down the Schuylkill River, the skateboarders at Paine Park, or the fireworks above the Art Museum on the 4 of July.
Apartment itself is located on the 1floor of this massive brick front corner property.  A must see for anyone looking to live in this area. In addition to the amazing location this 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment has tall ceilings, great natural light, and an efficient kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, full size refrigerator and full size stove.
The living room offers a nice open feel with windows facing 22nd Street (north) and allows plenty of natural light to shine through all day long.  Hardwood floors throughout makes it easy to clean and maintain.  The bedroom boasts good closet space and your very own washer/dryer combo.
A perfect unit with all the features you want including:
Dishwasher

title: Beautiful courtyards, Seasonal Bike Share Program, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
